ygData.subject: Freeport Bank Crowding Secret was: Bard Petition
ygData.msgSnippet: Several people have mentioned the annoying overcrowding problem in the Freeport bank. Well there is a reason why those people are there, but first the
ygData.messageBody:
Several people have mentioned the annoying
overcrowding problem in the Freeport bank.
Well there is a reason why those people are
there, but first the obligatory:

***SPOILER***
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
.
Ok, so curiosity got the better of you I see 8)
Here is the story- there is a guard that spawns
in the bank named Krazen Loosh. The people are
all camping there waiting for him to spawn so
they can kill him. Apparently, the other guards
do not assist him. There is a minor faction hit
associated with killing Krazen but I have seen
people camp for a week without becoming KOS.
He is VERY easy to take down and drops lots of
platinum so now that pottery is nerfed, Krazen is the
newest get rich quick scheme. (Although people have
been killing him for quite a long, its the
former potters joining the sadists that has created
the mess) I wish Verant would do something about it
because it has gotten out of hand. Maybe we should
all camp the bank and bring the zone down to bring
the point home to Verant 8)


Baraden of TM, Prexus, and Brell
